channel.title: Anaconda on YT Notes Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Anaconda on YT Notes Blog

item.title: Anaconda Python Update
item.description: Anaconda wrapes python in a pack. It is convenient to use Anaconda to install python when you are new to everything about python. Recently, I noticed that my python version is 3.5.x while the newest version of python is 3.6. I found this problem when I was tring to use some modules that contain functions be newly added in version 3.6 and thus get errors. My python was installed via Anaconda, so I have to use anaconda to update my python version.
